name: Booting-Aids
short_description:
Helps you to Boot your experimental assembly language programs with a USB Memory Stick. Hope to make booting of experiments easy, as easy as it used to be with floppy discs, but using USB memory sticks.
Program only tested on Windows 7 Laptop. 
The Memory Sticks have to be prepared, (Format them Fat16 with Volume Label = "BOOTING"
and then run my program Booting-Aids, once to 
write a experimental Boot-loader onto the memory stick's sector 0.
Then leave my program, simply copy your experimental program .bin  or .com , to the empty memory stick in the normal way as a file.
Log off, turn back on, press 1 number 1 to 9 and It should be able to boot
summary: Helps you to Boot your assembly language programs with a USB Memory st
